title: Biden Administration to Offer Thousands of Venezuelan Migrants Legal Path Into U.S.
description: The humanitarian parole program would be available to up to 24,000 Venezuelans who have a U.S. sponsor. However, a pandemic-era rule will be extended to expel Venezuelans who enter the country illegally.
dc:creator: Eileen Sullivan and Zolan Kanno-Youngs
media:credit: Tamir Kalifa for The New York Times
media:description: Migrants waiting to be transported to a U.S. Customs and Border Protection facility after crossing the Rio Grande into the United States.
